CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A highly effective photovoltaic polymer with near - infrared response , poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl } {PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)} , was synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

1. "photovoltaic polymer" - This is a type of material used in photovoltaic cells to convert light energy into electrical energy.
2. "poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl }" - This is the specific name of the synthesized polymer. It is a type of polypyrrole, which is a conductive polymer. The "N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl" part is the repeating unit of the polymer.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. photovoltaic polymer
2. poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl }
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl } - This is the specific name of the synthesized material. It is a type of polypyrrole.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A highly effective photovoltaic polymer with near - infrared response , poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl } {PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)} , was synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

1. "photovoltaic polymer" - This is a type of polymer used in photovoltaic cells to convert light energy into electrical energy.
2. "near - infrared response" - This refers to the ability of the polymer to respond to near-infrared light.
3. "poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl }" - This is the name of the specific polymer that was synthesized. It is a type of polypyrrole with certain functional groups (N-[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5,5'-diyl) in its structure.
4. "{PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)}" - This is likely a substituent or additive that was used in the synthesis of the polymer. It is identified as PDTP-DTDPP(Bu), but its exact meaning is not clear without additional context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. "near-infrared response" - This is the material property referred to in the paragraph. It indicates that the synthesized polymer has the ability to respond to near-infrared light.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The relevant property value in the paragraph is:
